scripts.deployDev: DEPLOY=deploy npm run build && touch out/.nojekyll && cp CNAME_DEV out/ && mv out/CNAME_DEV out/CNAME && npx push-dir --dir=out --branch=gh-pages --cleanup --verbose
scripts.deployProd: DEPLOY=deploy npm run build && touch out/.nojekyll && cp CNAME_PROD out/ && mv out/CNAME_PROD out/CNAME && npx push-dir --dir=out --branch=gh-pages-prod --cleanup --verbose
